snippet: Investors have been waiting to see whether the Federal Reserve will decide at a policy-making meeting this week to start winding down its economic stimulus program.
abstract: Stock market rises, as upbeat economic data bolsters investors' optimism ahead of Federal Reserve's policy-making meeting.
lead_paragraph: Investors have been waiting to see whether the Federal Reserve will decide at a policy-making meeting this week to start winding down its economic stimulus program.

headline.main: Data Lends Optimism Before Fed Meeting
headline.print_headline: Data Lends Optimism Before Fed Meeting
